description: The ULTIMATE ANTI AGING PRODUCT!Vitamin C + E + Botanical Hyaluronic Acid + Ferulic Acid + An Organic Herbal Infusion!Formulated To Get You Optimal Impact & Immediate Results!Aids In Reduction & Prevention Of:• Sun & Brown Spots*• Discoloration*• Wrinkles*• Overall Signs Of Aging On Your Face, Neck & Dcollet!*√ VITAMIN C (20.0%):The Highest Quality Vitamin C Source Available!• Superior Formulation w/Stabilized Vitamin C Called"Stay C 50"!• Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate -No L-Ascorbic Acid!• Easily Bio-Converted By Skin Enzymes For Immediate Absorption, Repair, & Preventative Treatment!*• Get Benefits For Your Skin The Moment You Apply!*√ VITAMIN E (1.0%) - Alpha Tocopherol:Antioxidant • Anti-inflammatory • Emollient• Associated With Accelerated Healing & Used For Healing Burns & Scars!*√ BOTANICAL HYALURONIC ACID (BHA) (5.0%):FOR SUPER HYDRATION & MOISTURIZATION• Your Skin Normally Contains 10-20% Water-But As We Age It Can Drop To Below 10%!-YIKES!• BHA Rescues With Its Unique Ability To Hold More Than 1000 X Its Weight In Water!• 100% Botanical Plant Sources (Not from Animal Parts Like Rooster Combs)!√ FERULIC ACID (1.0%)- Very Expensive Serums Only Contain 0.5%!• A Critical Ingredient That Neutralizes Free Radicals & Acts Synergistically W/Vitamin C & E & Increases Their Lifespan!√ ORGANIC HERBAL INFUSION! - Formulated W/ 70% Organic Ingredients In An FDA Registered Facility.Will Have a Dramatic Effect On Your Face!*Some Say "It's like A Facelift in a Bottle!"*Be Amazed At Your Results After Only 7 Straight Days Of Use!Add To Your Cart Now! - No Risk, 30 Day "Customer Happiness" Satisfaction Guarantee!*These statements have not been evaluated by the FDA. This products is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.
